Installed and ran fine, but... When uninstalled it screwed up some fonts. Check this out to fix your registry:

Hey mate, I need some help. Everything was working fine, until I got to the game play. It freezes and crashes, everytime I start a mission on Single Player. Can you help me out mate?
You don't need to mess up with the register; just make a copy of the fonts that will be affected and put them back in afterwards.
